✗ 0/8 specify#differences 
└───── Should be true
❝ ok false
└───── One is love
❝ equal 
13 // 1
└───── One is love
❝ equal 
"undefined" // 1
└───── One two
❝ notEqual 
2 // 2
└───── Blooper
❝ deepEqual 
{
  "a" : {
    "b" : [1m3[0m[1m // != 1[0m
  }
}
└───── Not Deep
❝ notDeepEqual 
{
  "a" : 1
}
└───── Dont be like that
❝ strictEqual 
5 // 3
└───── 3 4 knock on the door
❝ notStrictEqual 
4 // 4
✗ 1/5 specify#circular_reference 
└───── undefined
❝ equal 
{
 "abc": "Hello",
 "go": {
  "$ref": "$"
 }
} // "undefined"
└───── undefined
❝ equal 
"undefined" // {
 "abc": "Hello",
 "go": {
  "$ref": "$"
 }
}
└───── undefined
❝ equal 
{[1m
  "abc" : "Hello",[0m[1m // != undefined[0m[1m
  "go" : {
  }[0m[1m // != undefined[0m
}
└───── undefined
❝ equal 
{
  [1m[0m[1m// [0m[1m"abc" : "Hello",
  [0m[1m// [0m[1m"go" : {"abc":"Hello","go":{}}[0m
}
✗ 19/37 summary
